quotes.quote: The truth about injustice always sounds outrageous.
Let us never tolerate outrageous conspiracy theories.
The most outrageous lies that can be invented will find believers if a person only tells them with all his might.
It's outrageous to me when I see people hate on someone because of their sexuality. I hate the intolerance. I hate the judgment. I hate it so much.
In difficult times, fashion is always outrageous.
Don't be afraid to be outrageous; the critics will shoot you down anyway.
People find meaning and redemption in the most unusual human connections.
It requires a very unusual mind to undertake the analysis of the obvious.
It's outrageous to line your pockets off the misery of the poor; It's outrageous, the crimes some human beings must endure.
Outrageous behavior, also known as the lunatic fringe, is the seed bed of innovation and creativity.
Your ability to use mind whatever way you choose is outrageous. Much will depend upon how intensely you approach the study and the state of mind in which you begin.
We live in a world of outrageous pain. The only response to outrageous pain is outrageous love.
Be outrageous, ridicule the fraidy-cats, rejoice in all the oddities that freedom can produce.
The most outrageous thing we can do in this world is to accept what happens and fly with it.
It requires a serious mind and a determined heart to pray past the ordinary into the unusual.
Most of the humor comes from how outrageous the situations and circumstances are.
Sometimes you get an idea that's so outrageous it's bound to be really important.
Great things are only possible with outrageous requests.
